title: Pulled chicken with barbecue sauce and baked potatoes
description: No one will ever guess that this American-style barbecue chicken is a budget recipe - and your secret is safe with us.
ingredients: 4 x 300g/10½oz floury potatoes, such as King Edward or Maris Piper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
handful chopped fresh flatleaf parsley or chives (optional)
4 tbsp soured cream and chive dip, or reduced-fat crème fraîche (optional)
